title: The Sendai
description: SOMETHING VERY STRANGE IS HAPPENING AT THE KARYLL CLINIC…A series of infant deaths, all of them test-tube babies…falsified records and top-secret, off-limits research until…the death of a perfectly healthy young doctor: alleged cause -- heart attack.Dr. Rudy Gerson, determined to learn what connects these events finds himself face to face with the gruesome results of a hideous research conspiracy. And it's up to Gerson to stop it. Before someone stops hims…
author: William Woolfolk
